column6: The role of the Chief Executive is to lead and manage the UKHO effectively in order to ensure delivery of the objectives and targets set for it by the Owner, and in particular the successful implementation of an approved Corporate Pla

Support the Corporate Change Programme, specifically safety of use of Navigational products is maintained and ensuring processes, systems and procedures are constantly reviewed to achieve max. efficiency and effectives.  Also ensures products and services aware managed efficiently to achieve the agreed outputs and also output levels using most effective planning and forecasting methodologies.

Develops new products for existing and new markets.  Maintaining existing products in existing markets and seeks opportunities to take them into new markets.  Manage the delivery of all developments in relation to our digital products and services.  Manage the delivery of the UKHO digital products and services to customers

to increase the commerciality of the UKHO by leading the delivery of sales growth in the emerging digital navigational market, developing new routes to market, entering new markets, developing new products that have sustainable competitive advantage, and transforming the business into one that is truly customer focused

Works with the International Hydrographic Community, leading on Defence matters and discharging the UK Government’s responsibilities for the Maritime and Coastguard Agency under the UN Convention of Safety of Life at Sea.
Leads Information Services, the Strategy Objective 7 Programme and the Portfolio Office
